item.title: China says US shouldn't use other countries as 'pretext' to pursue its interests
item.description: China says the United States shouldn't use other countries as a pretext to pursue its interests in Greenland

item.title: WATCH: Wildfires rage in Australia
item.description: Nearly 900,000 acres have burned in the past days as the country bakes in a record-setting heatwave.

item.title: Iranian leader, Trump trade threats as activists say protest deaths rising
item.description: Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Sunday hit back against U.S. President Donald Trump's threats of military action in Iran in support o...

item.title: DOJ launches criminal investigation into Fed Chair Jerome Powell, he says
item.description: Federal prosecutors have launched a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, he confirmed in a statement Sunday night.

item.title: WATCH: Surfer rescued in Puerto Rico
item.description: The surfer is safe and in stable condition after being missing for more than 24 hours.
